full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I BSANGS MCHOD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES MYUR MDZAD YE SHES MGON PO LA GSOL MCHOD PHUL NI 'DOD DON GSOL BA BTAB PA 'DI NI DZA YA PAntI BLO BZANG SNYEN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON ZHES BYA BAS RANG GI KHA BTON RGYUN 'DON PA'I CHED DU TSANG MA'I SKYES BU DAM PA GSUNG BZHIN DU BGYIS PA'O,, ,,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING BRGYAN DU BYON, ,MANGGALAm,, ,,)
